Coptic (Greek) Change History
====================

2.3 (2024-08-29)
----------------
* Added tablet layout
* Added Aegyptus font
* Added example text

2.2 (2019-02-19)
----------------
* Keyman keyboard generated by decompiling older .kmx 
* Adjustments based on 2.1 version of the keyboard layout document
  
(2010)
----------------
* Keyman keyboard originally created
